justification: The parent-report block included “a publisher approved version of the Social Responsiveness Scale (SRS-2), which measures social adjustment in typical and autistic populations with a focus on social deficits in ASD.”
The same block administered “the autism-spectrum quotient (AQ …), which measures autistic traits.”

The study assessed cooperation using “The Information Sampling Trust Game,” which “combines a well-established behavioral economics paradigm known as the single-shot Trust Game …” to study how participants decide whether to share with a trustee.
